name: AikoTraining Day
description:
1. Controls
  2. move wasd or arrow
  3. Jump - Space , C key
  4. shoot - left mouse ,F key
  5. dash - right mouse, V key
  6. Enter key or Left  Mouse click to start game or restart game
  7. ESC key to quit Game in PC

Aiko needs to complete her Training , but she must not forget to collect the hearts...

I did some of the art my self  trying my hand at 1 Bit art ! i still have a lot to learn!

Thanks for playing !!!
